SqlMap.select: SELECT MS.SEAT_NO ,MS.FIXED_SEAT_FLG ,MCV.CONTENTS_ID ,MCV.CONTENTS_DV ,MCV.CONTENT_POSITION_X ,MCV.CONTENT_POSITION_Y ,MCV.VERTICAL_FLG FROM MST_SEAT MS INNER JOIN MST_CONTENT_VIEW MCV ON MS.CONTENTS_ID = MCV.CONTENTS_ID WHERE MS.FLOOR_PLACE_DV = #FLOOR_PLACE_DV#

SELECT MS.SEAT_NO , MS.FIXED_SEAT_FLG , MS.FLOOR_PLACE_DV , MCV.CONTENTS_ID , MCV.CONTENTS_DV , MCV.CONTENT_POSITION_X , MCV.CONTENT_POSITION_Y , MCV.VERTICAL_FLG , TEL.LOCATION_DATA_SEQ , TEL.EMP_NO , ME.DISPLAY_EMP_NM , TEL.EXTENSION_LINE_NO , TEL.EMP_STATUS_DV , TEL.FIXED_FLG FROM MST_SEAT MS INNER JOIN MST_CONTENT_VIEW MCV ON MS.CONTENTS_ID = MCV.CONTENTS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN T_EMP_LOCATION TEL ON MS.SEAT_NO = TEL.SEAT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MST_EMP ME ON TEL.EMP_NO = ME.EMP_NO
MS.FLOOR_PLACE_DV = #FLOOR_PLACE_DV#

SELECT MS.SEAT_NO , MS.FIXED_SEAT_FLG , MS.FLOOR_PLACE_DV , MCV.CONTENTS_ID , MCV.CONTENTS_DV , MCV.CONTENT_POSITION_X , MCV.CONTENT_POSITION_Y , MCV.VERTICAL_FLG , TEL.LOCATION_DATA_SEQ , TEL.EMP_NO , ME.DISPLAY_EMP_NM , TEL.EXTENSION_LINE_NO , TEL.EMP_STATUS_DV , TEL.FIXED_FLG , MF.TEL_NO , MF.FLOOR_PLACE_DV_NM FROM MST_SEAT MS INNER JOIN MST_CONTENT_VIEW MCV ON MS.CONTENTS_ID = MCV.CONTENTS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN T_EMP_LOCATION TEL ON MS.SEAT_NO = TEL.SEAT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MST_EMP ME ON TEL.EMP_NO = ME.EMP_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN MST_FLOOR_PLACE_DV MF ON MS.FLOOR_PLACE_DV = MF.FLOOR_PLACE_DV
MS.FLOOR_PLACE_DV = #FLOOR_PLACE_DV#
